wordGroup: audio signal 声频信号；可听声信号

sentences.en: This digital audio player supports multiple formats.
sentences.cn: 这台数字音频播放器支持多种格式。

sentences.en: He demonstrated how audio signals could be transmitted along cables without distortion.
sentences.cn: 他演示了音频信号如何通过电缆传输而不失真。

sentences.en: Users can download MP3 music files and record them directly onto a CD audio disc using a PC CD burner.
sentences.cn: 使用者可下载MP3音乐文件并用个人电脑光盘刻录机直接将其刻录到音频光盘上。
